snippet.title: GameCube review: 'Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 2'
snippet.description:
* Don't expect miracle gameplay from BMX superstar "Miracle Boy" Mirra in this second outing of his extreme series. In fact, not much is different from the PS2 and Xbox versions of the same game.
http://www.cnn.com/2002/TECH/fun.games/01/01/freestyle.davemirra.idg/index.html

snippet.title: Daniel Sieberg: Mature video games controversial?
snippet.description:
* Sparked by the popularity of adult video games, a new batch of games is being marketed to the 17-and-older crowd. Slapped with an M, or 'mature' rating, these controversial games depict violence and live nudity.
http://www.cnn.com/2002/TECH/11/09/otsc.sieburg/index.html

snippet.title: Top 20 best-selling games for mid-June
snippet.description:
* Nintendo cleaned up at retail stores in early June thanks to the launch of the Game Boy Advance, with seven of the top 10 best-selling titles belonging to the Game Boy Color or GBA. The popular "Zelda" and "Pokemon" series were among the top ...
http://www.cnn.com/2001/TECH/fun.games/07/24/top.20.games.idg/index.html

snippet.title: Gamers use bullets, bombs, bikinis
snippet.description:
* When it comes to guys, video games are a no-brainer -- bullets, bombs and bikinis.
http://www.cnn.com/2003/TECH/fun.games/06/02/games.females/index.html
